UTME  
i)  MOCTECH requires  
a) four (4) 'O' level credit passes in SSC or 
its equivalent in physics,  
Chemistry, Mathematics and any 
other science or technical subject. 
Candidates are expected to have at 
least ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
b) National Vocational Certificate in 
Computer Studies from an approved 
Vocational Enterprise Institution.
